descriptionHtml:
Small update v1.1a

A few problems are fixed.
All Weapons are with Scabbards.

p.s
It\'s a pain in the neck to fix the blood on weapons,replace or delete it by each one.



 

*ATTENTION*
The form of this version is different from previous.
If you have previous file,then remove it at first.

Please readme file

This mod add new creatable akaviri weapons  \"Nagamaki\", \"Tachi\" and \"Nodachi\" to your skyrim.

For I fix this mod to creatable, [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=309299]Black Widowmaker[/url] gave me advice How to make this mod to creatable.

I appreciate for his Support and messenger who tell him my update plan.  

You can check and play his great mod here
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3774]18 Black Katanas reloaded - craftable and improvable[/url]

Thank you so much!:)


-------How to Use

1.Overwrite \"Data\" folder to your skyrim\'s folder.

2.Run your Skyrim

3.In the game, you can get these weapons at Forge by Smith.also these weapons are improved at Grind Stone.

The recipe is 

Nagamaki Shizuka-Gata:Smith-Daedric:2 Steel ingot,1 Orichalcum ingot (You need 1 Orichalcum ingot to improve.)

Nagmaki Tomoe-Gata:Smith-Ebony:2 Steel ingot,1 Ebony ingot (You need 1 Ebony ingot to improve.)

Tachi:Same with Tomoe-Gata.

Nodachi:Same with Shizuka-Gata.

Kodachi:Same with Tomoe-Gata.
author: Gajumaru
